channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- CardDAV Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- CardDAV Server

item.title: CVE-2018-8928|2024-08-05T07:10:47.217Z -- synology -- carddav%20server
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Address Book Editor in Synology CardDAV Server before 6.0.8-0086 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) family_name, (2) given_name, or (3) additional_name parameter.
